xpFarmingIntro: Tips and tricks to maximize your experience gains in the wasteland. This guide focuses on leveraging Intelligence for optimal XP.
xpFarmingKeyPrincipleDesc: Each point of Intelligence (INT) provides approximately +2.07% to earned experience (XP). Therefore, for maximum XP farming, the entire S.P.E.C.I.A.L. focus is on Intelligence!
xpFarmingResourceNote: Note: English-language resources (map, wiki) usually contain more up-to-date information.
xpFarmingTeamAlwaysJoin: ALWAYS be on a team. The optimal choice is a Casual Team.
xpFarmingTeamCasualBonus: Each bond in a Casual Team gives +1 INT (maximum +4 INT with a full team of 4).
xpFarmingArmorUnyieldingDesc: Grants +3 to all S.P.E.C.I.A.L. stats (except Endurance) at low health (below 20%). A full set (5 pieces) gives +15 INT at low health. This is the most powerful INT buff from armor.
xpFarmingArmorBonusIntelTitle: Secondary Effect (2nd star): +1 or +2 to Intelligence
xpFarmingArmorBonusIntelDesc: Look for armor with the legendary property '+1 Intelligence' or '+2 Intelligence'. In total, you can get up to +5 INT or +10 INT from a full set.
xpFarmingArmorThirdStarNote: Third Effect (3rd star): Not critical for XP farming.
xpFarmingUnderarmorShieldedCasual: Shielded Casual Underarmor: +3 INT (+3 Charisma, +1 Luck). One of the best for XP farming.
xpFarmingUnderarmorShieldedCasualObtain: How to obtain: Potential reward (5% chance) from 'Daily: Queen of the Hunt' quest. Requires learning schematics for the three previous linings.
xpFarmingUnderarmorShieldedVault76: Shielded Vault 76 Jumpsuit: +2 INT (+1 Strength, +2 Endurance, +2 Luck).
xpFarmingUnderarmorShieldedVault76Obtain: How to obtain: Schematic available from the start; fluxes needed for modification.
xpFarmingMutationEggHeadDesc: Egg Head: +6 INT (reduces Strength and Endurance by -3). With Strange in Numbers and a full team, this becomes +8 INT.
xpFarmingMutationHerdMentalityDesc: Herd Mentality: +2 to all S.P.E.C.I.A.L. stats (including INT) when on a team (-2 to all if solo). With Strange in Numbers and a full team, this becomes +3 INT.
xpFarmingMutationHerbivore: Herbivore: Doubles the positive effects of plant-based food (including buffs to INT and XP). Recommended for maximum XP farming.
xpFarmingMutationCarnivore: Carnivore: Doubles the positive effects of meat-based food. Alternative to Herbivore, but XP buffs from meat are usually harder to obtain.
xpFarmingMutationMarsupialDesc: Marsupial: Increases jump height and carry weight, but reduces INT by -1 (or -0.25 INT with Class Freak).
xpFarmingMutationMarsupialTip: Recommendation: You can temporarily negate the INT penalty by using a 'Marsupial' serum before farming. This provides the mutation's benefits without the INT loss for the serum's duration.
xpFarmingMutationsPerksNote: Important: Use 'Starched Genes' (Luck) to prevent accidental curing of mutations and 'ClassFreak' (Luck) to reduce negative mutation effects by 75%.
xpFarmingPerkNightPerson: Night Person: +3 INT (and +3 Perception) at night (6:00 PM to 6:00 AM game time).
xpFarmingPerkColaNut: Cola Nut: Enhances the effects of Nuka-Cola (including Nuka-Cola Cranberry for XP).
xpFarmingPerkChemFiend: Chem Fiend: Increases the duration of chems (e.g., Mentats).
xpFarmingPerkChemist: Chemist: Doubles the amount of chems crafted.
xpFarmingPerkInspirationalXP: Inspirational: +5%/+10%/+15% XP when on a team (depending on rank).
xpFarmingPerkStrangeInNumbers: Strange in Numbers: Enhances positive mutation effects by +25% for each mutated teammate (including yourself). Boosts Egg Head and Herd Mentality.
xpFarmingPerkStarchedGenes: Starched Genes: Prevents acquiring new mutations from radiation and curing existing ones with RadAway. Mandatory to preserve needed mutations.
xpFarmingPerkClassFreak: Class Freak: Reduces negative mutation effects by 25%/50%/75% (depending on rank). Highly recommended.
xpFarmingPerkCurator: Curator: Doubles the duration of Bobbleheads and Magazines.
xpFarmingLegendaryPerkIntel: Legendary Intelligence: +1 INT per rank (maximum +5 INT). Mandatory for maximizing INT.
xpFarmingChemBerryMentats: Berry Mentats: +5 INT for 5 minutes (+ highlights living creatures). Most popular. Duration increased by 'Chem Fiend'.
xpFarmingFoodIntelTitle: Food (INT Buffs - Effects from this category do not stack)
xpFarmingFoodBrainBombs: Brain Bombs: +7.5 INT (with Herbivore). Recipe: Brain Fungus x3, Mothman Eggs x3, Sugar Bombs (clean) x2, Purified Water x1, Wood x1. Duration 90 minutes.
xpFarmingFoodBrainFungusSoup: Brain Fungus Soup: +5 INT (with Herbivore). Easier to cook. Recipe: Brain Fungus x1, Boiled Water x1, Wood x1.
xpFarmingFoodSteepedFernFlowerTea: Steeped Fern Flower Tea: +5 INT (with Herbivore).
xpFarmingFoodXPTitle: Food (XP Buffs - Effects from this category do not stack, except Canned Meat Stew)
xpFarmingFoodCranberryRelish: Cranberry Relish: +25% XP (with Herbivore & 'Live & Love 3' magazine). Recipe: Cranberries x2, Gourd x2, Sugar x1, Boiled Water x1, Wood x1.
xpFarmingFoodCranberryCobbler: Cranberry Cobbler: +12.5% XP (with Herbivore & 'Live & Love 3'). Easier to cook.
xpFarmingFoodTastySquirrelStew: Tasty Squirrel Stew: +25% XP (with Carnivore). Recipe: Squirrel Bits x1, Bloodleaf x1, Carrot x1, Mutfruit x1, Potato x1, Boiled Water x1, Wood x1.
xpFarmingFoodCannedMeatStew: Canned Meat Stew: +5% XP. Reward from 'Feed the People' event. This buff stacks with other food XP buffs.
xpFarmingFoodNukaColaCranberry: Nuka-Cola Cranberry: +2% XP (or +6% XP with 'Cola Nut' rank 3).
xpFarmingBobbleheadLeader: Bobblehead: Leader: +5% XP. Possible spawn: The Crosshair, in a trailer on a table.
xpFarmingMagazineLiveLove8: Live & Love #8: +5% XP when on a team.
xpFarmingMagazineLiveLove3: Live & Love #3: +50% effectiveness of healing and food from plants (enhances Herbivore and buffs like Cranberry Relish, Brain Bombs). Ally Joey Bello may sell them.
xpFarmingLunchboxes: Lunchboxes: Opening grants a 'Party Time' buff (+25% XP) for 1 hour to nearby players. Stacks up to 4 times (+100% XP). Key for rapid XP farming.
xpFarmingBuffWellRestedExtended: Rest Buff (Well Rested / Kindred Spirit / Lover's Embrace): +5% XP for 1-3 hours after sleeping.
xpFarmingBuffMothmanWisdomTrue: Mothman's True Wisdom: +15% XP for 1 hour (reward from 'Mothman Equinox' event).
xpFarmingBuffMothmanWisdomRegular: Mothman's Wisdom: +5% XP for 1 hour (reward from 'Path to Enlightenment' event).
xpFarmingBuffMothmanNote: Note: These Mothman event buffs do not stack with each other or the Sacred Mothman Tome buff.
xpFarmingBuffSacredMothmanTome: Sacred Mothman Tome: +5% XP for 1 hour (interact with the book in Mothman Museum).
xpFarmingBuffAllySettlerForager: Ally: Settler Forager: May grant a +5% XP buff.
xpFarmingBuffDerbyGame: Mechanical Derby Game (C.A.M.P.): Using it can grant +2 INT for 30 min.
xpFarmingBuffMeatWeekPot: Meat Week Event: Participating in 'Grahm's Meat-Cook' can grant 'Mighty Meat Sweats' buff (+5% XP).
xpFarmingEventDoubleXP: Double XP Weekend: Developers periodically enable a x2 XP multiplier for several days. Check game news.
xpFarmingEventMothmanEquinoxEvent: Mothman Equinox: Grants a +15% XP buff upon completion.
xpFarmingEventMeatWeekEvent: Meat Week: Grants a +5% XP buff from Meat-Cook.
xpFarmingLocationWestTekDetailed: West Tek Research Center: Best predictable location. Many Super Mutants. Easiest and most reliable for solo players. You can reset the interior instance by entering the elevator, waiting ~1 minute, then exiting.
xpFarmingLocationWestTekPathNote: Follow an efficient clearing path inside West Tek for best results.
xpFarmingEventRadRumble: 'Radiation Rumble': Huge waves of glowing ghouls. Ore collection is secondary to XP farming.
xpFarmingEventEvictionNotice: 'Eviction Notice': Endless waves of Firestarter Super Mutants. Protect the radiation scrubber.
xpFarmingEventMoonshineJamboree: 'Moonshine Jamboree': Many Gulpers and Mirelurks. Collect toxic goo.
xpFarmingOtherGoodEventsList: Other good events: 'Uranium Fever', 'Line in the Sand', 'Guided Meditation', 'One Violent Night'.
xpFarmingLocationTheBurrows: The Burrows: Instance under Harpers Ferry, full of ghouls. Good West Tek alternative.
xpFarmingLocationAbandonedBogTown: Abandoned Bog Town: Skyscraper with Super Mutants (workshop).
xpFarmingLocationWhitespringGolfClub: Whitespring Golf Club: Many ghouls, especially effective during a nuke zone.
xpFarmingLocationCharlestonCapitolFortDe: Charleston Capitol / Fort Defiance: Many ghouls.
xpFarmingLocationGraftonSteelEtc: Grafton Steel / Huntersville / NAK Radio Array: Locations with Super Mutants.
xpFarmingLocationDailyOpsExpeditions: Daily Ops / Expeditions: Good XP for kills and completion bonus.
xpFarmingLocationBestOverallNote: Note: While West Tek is great for solo, 'Radiation Rumble' (Gleaming Depths) is generally considered the best overall XP event when done efficiently in a team.
xpFarmingFinalBoostPrepSteps:
- Equip a full set of Unyielding armor with INT bonuses.
- Wear Shielded Casual Underarmor (+3 INT).
- Ensure active mutations: Egg Head, Herd Mentality, Herbivore.
- Set S.P.E.C.I.A.L. and perks for max INT (Inspirational, Strange in Numbers, Curator, etc.).
- Use the Legendary Intelligence perk.
xpFarmingFinalBoostBuffsSteps:
- Join/create a Casual Team.
- Use 4 Lunchboxes.
- Eat Brain Bombs or Brain Fungus Soup (+INT).
- Eat Cranberry Relish (+XP).
- Take Berry Mentats (+INT).
- Activate Bobblehead: Leader (+XP) or Intelligence (+INT).
- Read Live & Love #3 (for Herbivore) or Live & Love #8 (+XP in team).
- Drink Nuka-Cola Cranberry (with Cola Nut perk).
- Get a sleep buff.
- Get Mothman event buff (if available).
- Lower health below 20% for Unyielding armor.
xpFarmingFinalBoostFarmSteps:
- Go to West Tek or a high-level public event with many enemies.
- Kill everything that moves!
xpFarmingPerkStrangeInNumbersNote: Strange in Numbers – Enhances mutation effects when in a team
xpFarmingPerkClassFreakNote: Class Freak – Reduces negative effects of mutations
xpFarmingPerkCuratorNote: Curator – Doubles duration of magazines and bobbleheads
xpFarmingPerkChemFiendNote: Chem Fiend – Extends duration of chems
xpFarmingNoteInspirationalCharismaSpecif: (15 Uny + 3 Shielded CUA + 3 Herd Mentality + 2 Inspirational/SiN = 23 Chr)
xpFarmingBuffBrainsSpecific: Broiled Scorchbeast Brain / Brain Bombs – +8 INT (0.5 / 1.5 hrs)
xpFarmingBuffCranberryRelishSpecific: Cranberry Relish / Tasty Squirrel Stew – +25% XP (1 hr)
xpFarmingBuffLiveLove8Detail: Live & Love #8 (Magazine) – +5% XP (1 hr, extended by Curator)
xpFarmingBuffLeaderBobbleheadSpecific: Leader Bobblehead – +5% XP (2 hrs, extended by Curator)
xpFarmingBuffWellRestedSpecific: Well Rested / Lover's Embrace (Camp) – +5% XP (lost on death, 2/3 hrs)
xpFarmingOutro: This guide outlines how to maximize XP. Experiment to find what works best for your playstyle and available resources!
